profile:
The first United Floors (formerly United Carpet) was introduced on Vancouver Island in 1975. Our Nanaimo location opened its doors in 1986. There are now seven United Floors locations on Vancouver Island, and over 20 locations across Canada.

Family owned and operated, United Floors has been beautifying homes in Nanaimo and surrounding regions for over 25 years. Our family has been a part of the flooring industry for three generations.

When it comes to our staff, we have a family mentality and are proud to say that some members of our staff have been with us since the beginning. Our team is a knowledgeable, creative, spirited group of people who genuinely love what we do. 

We offer a huge selection of flooring products including carpet, hardwood, cork, vinyl sheet, vinyl tile/plank, laminate, and commercial flooring. We also have the largest selection of in-stock area rugs in Nanaimo.

We also carry window coverings! We offer products exclusive to Hunter Douglas that are made-to-order to fit your needs, along with our complimentary in-home consultation service.

We have one of the largest retail flooring showrooms on Vancouver Island, and we’re proud of it!

We are always striving to provide our clients with the best possible service and selection, with a fun and friendly environment we hope they’ll return to for all flooring needs.

Our usual customers know the advantages of returning to us again and again – friendly faces, quality products and, of course, a complimentary cup of coffee.
